thread.title_full: LEAKED: The TRUTH About Obama’s Drone Assassination Program! - Oximity

author: Lee Camp
title: LEAKED: The TRUTH About Obama’s Drone Assassination Program!
text:
LEAKED: The TRUTH About Obama’s Drone Assassination Program! The US Government has gotten around illegal assassinations by calling them “targeted attacks” and killing far-too-often far-too-many innocent civilians in our “peace missions.” President Obama even jokes about our use of predator drones. Lee Camp talks about the dangers of drone warfare and the fact that so few people give a damn.
